title: STAT+: As superbug fears grow, sales of antibiotics used in food-producing livestock rose dramatically last year
description: Amid fears of superbugs, the sale of medically important antibiotics given to food-producing livestock rose dramatically last year.
content: Amid fears of superbugs, the sale of medically important antibiotics given to food-producing livestock rose dramatically last year.
